org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler

Class ConnectionActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.ConnectionActions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServerActions

    public abstract class ConnectionActions
extends Object
    Class to implement actions related to general connection handler: channelClosed, startup, authentication, and error. Used to store and retrieve the session information.
